Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson  Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Keeler
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to police activity near Jackson/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Kostner, Madison, Pulaski and Jackson, due to police activity near Jackson/Keeler.

Allow extra travel time.
